name: OG Kush No.8 Flower Bhomb
description: ( 710 ) BHO Dabstract Cannabis Art A butane extracted hash oil (earwax) meditation offering the vibrational gift of Mastery. OG Kush No.8 represents the infinite in a seemingly finite world. Symbolic to the union of strength and flexibility of the pure spirit this geometrical dab design is a manifestation of balance and of the cosmic order. Revealing the marriage of the essence with the breath and of the Fire within, an internal alchemy that indicates a return to the center. This marijuana wax bhomb aids in bringing our spiritual perspective down to Earth and promotes action with true power and certainty. Mandalas are the language of the soul and a means to symbolic offering of the entire universe. Regarded as Divine passages, they're eternally observed as legitimate paths of scientific and spiritual enlightenment. The late analytical psychologist and writer, Carl G. Jung noted that by simply gazing at these patterns from the center outward, we tend to process our personal challenges with ease and often gain increased clarity and energy.
